swift.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: happening or done quickly and immediately
swift.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: My letter received a swift reply.
She shot a swift glance at Paul.
They were swift to deny the accusations.
swift.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: moving, or able to move, very fast
swift.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: She wiped her tears away in one swift movement.
swift.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a small brown bird that has pointed wings, flies very fast, and is similar to a swallow
swift.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunications; an electronic system that allows banks all over the world to send information and payments to each other
